p.k: Mahler: Symphony No.3 by the Orchestre national du Capitole de Toulouse and Tugan Sokhiev (2014).
p.d:
Orchestre National du Capitole de Toulouse, Tugan Sokhiev (Conductor) Orfeón Donostiarria, José Antonio Sainz Alfaro (Chorus Master), Les Eclats / ChSur d'enfants et de jeunes, François Terrieux (Chorus Master) Anna Larsson (alto)
Gustav Mahler (1860 - 1911) Symphony no 3 in D minor
Recorded at the Halle aux Grains, Toulouse, 28 June 2014 Directed by Jean-Pierre Loisi
